name: GET_live-streams
description: With no parameters added to the url, this will return all livestreams. Query by name or key to limit the list.

streamKey.description: The unique stream key that allows you to stream videos.

name.description: You can filter live streams by their name or a part of their name.

sortBy.description: Allowed: createdAt, publishedAt, name. createdAt - the time a livestream was created using the specified streamKey. publishedAt - the time a livestream was published using the specified streamKey. name - the name of the livestream. If you choose one of the time based options, the time is presented in ISO-8601 format.

sortOrder.description: Allowed: asc, desc. Ascending for date and time means that earlier values precede later ones. Descending means that later values preced earlier ones. For title, it is 0-9 and A-Z ascending and Z-A, 9-0 descending.

currentPage.description: Choose the number of search results to return per page. Minimum value: 1

pageSize.description: Results per page. Allowed values 1-100, default is 25.

$ul: **currentPageItems**: The number of items on the current page.
**itemsTotal**: Total number of items that exist.
**pageSize**: Maximum number of item per page.
**pagesTotal**: Number of items listed in the current page.
